channel.title: Comments on: You know who design

item.title: By: Bruce Aisher
item.dc:creator: Bruce Aisher
item.description: Agreed. That logo is great, but I don't get the whole retro aspect.
item.content:encoded: Agreed. That logo is great, but I don’t get the whole retro aspect.

item.title: By: Matt Davey
item.dc:creator: Matt Davey
item.description:
Lovely branding but the site doesn't seem very balanced and I don't really get the retro feel, mailchimp pull it off so well but here it feels like there needed to be 'something' when the design work speaks for itself.
Such a nice brand though, brought through to favicon expertly.
item.content:encoded:
Lovely branding but the site doesn’t seem very balanced and I don’t really get the retro feel, mailchimp pull it off so well but here it feels like there needed to be ‘something’ when the design work speaks for itself.

Such a nice brand though, brought through to favicon expertly.
